definition: The word "dritter" refers to the numerical position of an item in a sequence, specifically denoting the number three in the sequence. It is commonly used to describe the third person, object, or element in a series or ranking.

examples.german: Er ist der dritte Spieler im Team.
examples.english: He is the third player on the team.

examples.german: Sie ist in der dritten Klasse.
examples.english: She is in the third grade.

examples.german: Er hat den dritten Platz im Rennen belegt.
examples.english: He finished in third place in the race.

examples.german: Der dritte Stock ist das BÃ¼ro des Direktors.
examples.english: The third floor is the office of the director.
